summary: A dark-themed gamified self-improvement web app called 'LevelUp' with RPG/anime aesthetics, featuring a welcome screen, dashboard with XP system and quest cards, and bottom navigation
architectural_notes: Dark theme with purple and blue neon glowing accents
Gemini API integration for AI chat assistant using fetch with system instruction for SYSTEM character
Animation system for XP gain feedback and quest completion
Particle effects system for welcome screen background animation

Create a dashboard screen displaying player name, Level 1, an XP progress bar showing progress toward next level, and a section with 3 sample habit cards labeled as 'quests'
Implement a bottom navigation bar with four sections: Home, Chat, Leaderboard, and Profile, allowing navigation between screens
Apply a dark-themed RPG anime aesthetic with purple and blue neon glowing accents throughout the app, ensuring smooth and modern UI with mobile-first responsive design

Apply comprehensive dark theme across entire app with background color #0a0a0f, card backgrounds #1a1a2e, secondary cards/inputs #16213e, all text in white or #e2e8f0, accent color #7c3aed (purple), buttons with purple gradient from #7c3aed to #4f46e5, XP bar with glowing purple fill and soft glow shadow effect, subtle purple/blue glow on all cards using box-shadow, and bottom navigation bar with dark #1a1a2e background and purple active icon
